com.androidex.logger

类 Log

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.androidex.logger.Log

  • public class Log
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for a list (or tree) of LoggerNodes.

    When this is set as the head of the list, an instance of it can function as a drop-in replacement for android.util.Log. Most of the methods in this class server only to map a method call in Log to its equivalent in LogNode.

      • getLogNode

        public static LogNode getLogNode()
        Returns the next LogNode in the linked list.

      • setLogNode

        public static void setLogNode(LogNode node)
        Sets the LogNode data will be sent to.

      • println

        public static void println(int priority,
                           java.lang.String tag,
                           java.lang.String msg,
                           java.lang.Throwable tr)
        Instructs the LogNode to print the log data provided. Other LogNodes can be chained to the end of the LogNode as desired.
        参数:
        priority - Log level of the data being logged. Verbose, Error, etc.
        tag - Tag for for the log data. Can be used to organize log statements.
        msg - The actual message to be logged.
        tr - If an exception was thrown, this can be sent along for the logging facilities to extract and print useful information.

      • println

        public static void println(int priority,
                           java.lang.String tag,
                           java.lang.String msg)
        Instructs the LogNode to print the log data provided. Other LogNodes can be chained to the end of the LogNode as desired.
        参数:
        priority - Log level of the data being logged. Verbose, Error, etc.
        tag - Tag for for the log data. Can be used to organize log statements.
        msg - The actual message to be logged. The actual message to be logged.
